---
title: "Gather Rosters"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(nflfastR)
```

#Gets each players name,team, ID, ect for the years you are interested in
#Use same number as in gather_pbp. maximum is 20 and only takes integers.
```{r}
num_seasons=1
start_season=2022-num_seasons
```

```{r}
future::plan('multisession')
rosters <- nflfastR::fast_scraper_roster(start_season:2021)
```


#Writes out the players info to a csv
```{r}
write.csv(rosters, "../data/full_roster.csv")
```
